name: A Lot Of Struggle To Save
name_original: A Lot Of Struggle To Save
description:
A game made for Quarantine Game Jam.

In this game you play as a doctor who is dedicated to work on new experiments to make a cure for virus. Each level of game is divided into 2 sections.

  • Lab Test Section: Will have to make a medicine from given recipe
  • Saving People in City Section: Will have to save most possible people by warning healty people and helping sick people in certain time.

Controls:

  • Simple WASD/Arrow keys movement.
  • Use mouse click to interact/shoot.
  • Press "M" for map
  • "Esc" for pause menu

Credits

Game Designer, Level Designer, 3D art collection: Mahammad Saquib

Game Programming, Game Designer: Nabarun Roy

Music: 

  • Doctor Terrible Song: https://opengameart.org/content/doctor-terrible
  • Cyberpunk moonLight Theme by https://opengameart.org/content/cyberpunk-moonlight-sonata
